====== DESCRIPTION ======

A national juried exhibition with a focus on things decomposing, being in a state of decay, deconstructed, or paired down. Both the conceptual side as well as technical/ compositional side of the theme will be encouraged. Open to artists working in all media. This exhibition is open to all U.S. residents at least 18 years of age.

Exhibition Juror: Margot Muto, head of exhibitions at Memorial Art Gallery, Rochester, NY
